description:
Deimon`s game against the Guts begins. Hiruma tries to put pressure on them with words about this being their last chance to go to the Christmas Bowl. However, the Guts` coach has replaced the regular players with athletes from other clubs in order to win.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Battle of Effort, Fortitude and Will!
Effort ! Volonté ! Un combat sans merci !
Impegno! Costanza! Un incontro a tutta potenza!
努力! 根性! 全力勝負!
